summary: This mod lets you know who send the Dark Brotherhood after you in the note that the assassin carries.
descriptionHtml:
This small mod lets you know who tried to kill you by sending the Dark Brotherhood in the note that the assassin carries. It just gives you the name, it doesn\'t tell you where the person is so you will have to figure that out all by yourself. The person can be any unique npc in the world so it can still be an essential npc atm :).

Notes
-------

The name is just a random npc name added to the note, the  vanilla quest itself never have a real person who wants you dead.


Requirements
-------------------
None

Installation/Uninstallation
------------

1-Extract the file to your skyrim folder.
2-Enable dbassassin in your launcher

To uninstall:
1.Remove dbassassin.esp in DATA folder


Incompatibilities
-----------------
None that I know of.
author: Littleork
